code: import React from'react';import'./intro.css';import bg from'../../assets/image.png.jpg';import btnImg from'../../assets/hire me.png';import{Link}from'react-scroll';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Intro=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"intro",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"introContent",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"hello",children:"Hello,"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"introText",children:["I'm ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"introName",children:["Reuben",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"website designer"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"introPara",children:["i am a skilled webdesigner with experience in creating",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," visually appealing and user friendly websites"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:btnImg,alt:"Hire ",className:"btnImg"}),"Hire Me"]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:bg,alt:"profile",className:"bg"})]});};export default Intro;
